{{ja-kanjitab|さくら|yomi=k}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=さくら|-}},{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}} first attested in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'', the oldest extant historical record of ancient Japan, compiled in 712 {{CE}}. Originally derived from {{m|ja|咲く|tr=saku||to [[bloom]], [[burst]] [[open]]}} + {{m|ja|等|tr=-ra|pos=nominalizing and pluralizing suffix}}.
